LOHERA Name: Boxers Lake- Address: Lonsdale Drive, Enfield- Type: Public gardens- Local Heritage Asset: Originally in the grounds of South Lodge, one of the 3 lodges built for the keepers on Enfield Chase.  The house was leased to William Pitt for 6 years from 1747 and was later a private school.  In 1935 the estate was sold to Laings for housing.  Boxer

description: Works to oak tree covered by LBE Order Number 66 (1977)- (T1): crown reduction by up to 4m all round.
decision_conditions: The subject tree is not causing any known damage to the property, and works which will be detrimental to the tree cannot be justified on speculatory reasoning. The proposed works would have a significantly negative impact upon the tree's health and appearance.
